text: Tony Analau (born 16 May 1969) is a retired weightlifter who represented the Solomon Islands. Analau competed in the weightlifting at the 1996 Summer Olympics which were held in Atlanta, he entered the 64 kg division, but was unable to lift his starting weight of 80 kg, so he didn't finish the event.Sports Reference Profile ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Solomon Islands male weightlifters Category:Olympic weightlifters of the Solomon Islands Category:Weightlifters at the 1996 Summer Olympics
title: Tony Analau
